availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William R. Hervey (Jefferson County court clerk)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, court clerk. Kentucky native. Married to Eva Hervey. Father of William H. Hervey, James B. Hervey, Sallie Hervey, Mattie Hervey, Lucy Hervey, Eva Hervey, Katie Hervey, Annie Hervey, and Lorena Hervey. Court clerk in Jefferson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 5, p. 132.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 5, p. 551A.
Find A Grave, "William R. Hervey (1818-1910)," Memorial #156486126, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/156486126 (accessed January 2, 2020).
